title: Shono, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; ULQ
description: at L, two men carry a palanquin covered with a raincoat; they follow a man wearing a straw rain cloak running up hill; at R, two peasants attempt to shield themselves from the rain as they quickly head downhill; group of rooftops at LR; grey lines depicting rain
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
